CustomField.defaultValue: "The application form must be accompanied by:"+ BR() +BR()+ "• Letter of Acceptance from the approved host department"+ "• A structured CV, including a list of publications in peer review journals (including doi-links)"+ BR() +"• Evidence of training/experience; EAN membership certificate"+BR()+"• 2 letters of recommendation (in addition to the host acceptance letter)"+BR()+"• Copy of passport/Identification card"
CustomField.label: IMPORTANT
